metadata.title: CVE-2023-45920 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Xfig v3.2.8 was discovered to contain a NULL pointerdereference when calling XGetWMHints(). NOTE: this is disputed because itis not expected that an X application should continue to run when there isarbitrary anomalous behavior from the X server or window manager.

criterions.comment: xfig package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
